description.@en: You see that thing over there? There’s no chance I’m going near it . . .

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you are suffering from Stress, Fear or Terror, your Fury Dice do not explode. This lasts until you go to Sleep.
